
What follows are simple grid tables:

+-------------+--------------+
| Left Header | Right Header |
+=============+==============+
| Cell 1      | Cell 2       |
+-------------+--------------+
| Cell 3      | Cell 4       |
+-------------+--------------+

+--------------+
| Upper Header |
+--------------+
| Lower Header |
+==============+
| Cell 1       |
+--------------+
| Cell 3       |
+--------------+

+--------------+--------------+
| Left Header  | Right Header |
+==============+==============+
| Cell 1 with  | Cell 2       |
| wrapped text |              |
|              | Second line  |
+--------------+--------------+
| Cell 3       | Cell 4 with  |
|              | wrapped text |
+--------------+--------------+

+---------------------+-----------------------+
| Left-side Header    | Right-side Header     |
+=====================+=======================+
| ::                  | Plain text in Cell 2  |
|                     |                       |
|     a_function () { |                       |
|       echo "Hello"; |                       |
|     }               |                       |
+---------------------+-----------------------+
| Plain               | Start with plain text |
| text                |                       |
| in                  | ::                    |
| cell                |                       |
| 3                   |     b_function () {}  |
|                     |                       |
|                     | Back to plain text    |
+---------------------+-----------------------+

Then we can have some indented tables...

  +-------------+--------------+
  | Left Header | Right Header |
  +=============+==============+
  | Cell 1      | Cell 2a      |
  |             |              |
  |             | Cell 2b      |
  +-------------+--------------+
  | **Cell 3a** | ::           |
  |             |              |
  |   *Cell 3b* |   Cell 4     |
  +-------------+--------------+

And then some random text at the end.
